snippet: Many opponents of the Affordable Care Act have used cautionary warnings of its impact, and some of them are jam-packed with misleading information, an economist writes.
abstract: Many opponents of the Affordable Care Act have used cautionary warnings of its impact, and some of them are jam-packed with misleading information, an economist writes.

headline.main: Confusing the Public on the Affordable Care Act

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
